lyrics:
19 contributorsmercy lyricsverse 1
angel of mercy how did you find me
where did you read my story
pulled from the papers desperate and hardened
seeking a momentary fix

prechorus
all i wanted to say all i wanted to do has fallen apart now
all i wanted to feel i wanted to love its all my fault now
a tragedy i fear

chorus
angel of mercy how did you find me
how did you pick me up again
angel of mercy how did you move me
why am i on my feet again
and i see you
whoa whoa whoa
i feel you
whoa whoa whoa

verse 2
fortress of daylight caught me on standby
waiting to catch the quickest plane
fly me to nowhere its better than somewhere
thats where ive been and nothings changed
see onerepublic liveget tickets as low as 150you might also likeprechorus
all i wanted to say all i wanted to do has fallen apart now
all i wanted to feel i wanted to love its all my fault now
a tragedy i fear

chorus
angel of mercy how did you find me
how did you pick me up again
angel of mercy how did you move me
why am i on my feet again
and i see you
whoa whoa whoa
i feel you
whoa whoa whoa

bridge
a tragedy seemed to be but what now
oh now
a tragedy it seemed to be but what now

chorus

how did you pick me up again
